charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 851 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - Heroin, Sched I(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 180 months imposed on Count 1 and 180 months imposed on Count 3, with terms to run concurrently. Supervised Release 8 years imposed on Count 1 and a 6-year term imposed on Count 3, with these terms to run concurrently. Special Assessment $200 (paid). Restitution $11,312.(Amended 7/30/07 to modify restitution payee) AMENDED JUDGMENT dated 8/8/11: 117-months imposed on Count 1 and 117-months imposed on Count 3 of the Superseding Indictment, with these terms to run concurrently; 8-years supervised release imposed on Count 1 and 6-years supervised release imposed on Count3 of the Superseding Indictment, with these terms to run concurrently; Special Assessment $200 (paid); Restitution $11,312.00.

charges.charge_description: 21:860, 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C) and 851 DISTRIBUTE IN OR NEAR SCHOOLS/CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - Heroin - Sched I(3s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment 180 months imposed on Count 1 and 180 months imposed on Count 3, with terms to run concurrently. Supervised Release 8 years imposed on Count 1 and a 6-year term imposed on Count 3, with these terms to run concurrently. Special Assessment $200 (paid). Restitution $11,312. (Amended 7/30/07 to modify restitution payee) AMENDED JUDGMENT dated 8/8/11: 117-months imposed on Count 1 and 117-months imposed on Count 3 of the Superseding Indictment, with these terms to run concurrently; 8-years supervised release imposed on Count 1 and 6-years supervised release imposed on Count3 of the Superseding Indictment, with these terms to run concurrently; Special Assessment $200 (paid); Restitution $11,312.00.
